name: Amendola - Dessert - Lonsdale
additionalNotes: Dessert uses an undisclosed wrapper and is a sweet, creamy indulgence of flavors for the pallet. This cigar is infused with hazelnut and is sugar tipped. A Great cigar to end the night. Amendola Family Cigar Co. is a first generation, family owned, boutique premium cigar brand owned and operated by Jeffrey Amendola and Christopher Monaco.
